subject: Re: Frank's box on TV last night
author: wgungfu
full_text:
As far as I know.  The only other investigative paranormal shows (in
the states) still on the air are the TAPS related ones (TAPS and TAPS
International) on SciFi.  And I haven't seen them use a box yet.


Marty
